mlflex
Class PredictionEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.PredictionEvaluator

public class PredictionEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains logic for evaluating classification models. It orchestrates the process of performing classification for a particular data processor, feature-selection algorith, classification algorithm, number of features, and cross-validation fold. It also contains logic for distributing tasks across multiple computing nodes and threads.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo

PredictionEvaluator

public PredictionEvaluator(AbstractDataProcessor processor,
                           FeatureSelectionAlgorithm selectionAlgorithm,
                           ClassificationAlgorithm classificationAlgorithm,
                           int numFeatures,
                           int outerFold,
                           DataInstanceCollection dependentVariableInstances)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Constructor

Parameters:
processor - Data processor that handles data that will be used for constructing classification models
selectionAlgorithm - Feature-selection algorithm that will be applied prior to classification
classificationAlgorithm - Classification algorithm that will be used
numFeatures - The number of features that will be used for the classification models
outerFold - Outer cross-validation fold number
dependentVariableInstances - Dependent-variable data instances
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
